name: American Airlines Flagship First Class Lounge, London Heathrow
description:
A really brief stop in the AA Flagship Lounge here!

Accessed by travelling in international First Class or by holding OneWorld Emerald status.

This is a weak lounge if ambience is your thing. But, if you like a decent Eggs Benedict, stop by (if you qualify...).

Enjoy the video, and why not compare it to the - much better -BA sister lounge? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ekwfQ-NpgMc

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
